Crash: Minimize the number of collisions with other vehicles or obstacles.
MeanVelocity: Maximize the average speed of all vehicles.
MinVelocity: Maximize the minimum speed of all vehicles.
SquaredSpeedAboveMax: Minimize the squared amount by which vehicle speeds exceed the maximum speed.
FuelProxy: Minimize a proxy for fuel consumption.
BreakPenalty: Minimize the penalty based on the frequency of hard braking events.
HeadwayPenalty: Minimize the penalty based on the average headway distances between vehicles.
